name: Strive Employment Training
description: Participants are trained in employability skills and graduates are placed in jobs offering career advancement. An intensive training program using the nationally recognized STRIVE model, The Family School/STRIVE program prepares participants for employment and continues this relationship with a job placement and graduate services component.
